privacy_policy.alt: Link naar het privacybeleid van de service

delete_account.alert_description: This account will be permanently erased and you’ll no longer have access to any of your messages.
delete_account.alert_title: You’re about to lose all of your data
delete_account.dialog_description:
<text>Confirm that you would like to delete your account:</text>
<profile />
<list>
<item>You will not be able to reactivate your account</item>
<item>You will no longer be able to sign in</item>
<item>No one will be able to reuse your username (MXID), including you</item>
<item>You will leave all rooms and direct messages you are in</item>
<item>You will be removed from the identity server, and no one will be able to find you with your email or phone number</item>
</list>
<text>Your old messages will still be visible to people who received them. Would you like to hide your sent messages from people who join rooms in the future?</text>
delete_account.erase_checkbox_label: Yes, hide all my messages from new joiners
delete_account.mxid_mismatch: This value does not match your Matrix ID

edit_profile.display_name_help: Dit is wat anderen zien wanneer je bent ingelogd.
edit_profile.title: Profiel bewerken

password.change_disabled: Password changes are disabled by the administrator.
password.label: Wachtwoord

email_denied_alert.text: Het ingevoerde e-mailadres is niet toegestaan volgens het serverbeleid.
email_denied_alert.title: E-mailadres geweigerd door het beleid

add_email_form.email_denied_error: The entered email is not allowed by the server policy

email_exists_alert.text: Het ingevoerde e-mailadres is al toegevoegd aan dit account
email_exists_alert.title: E-mailadres bestaat al

add_email_form.email_exists_error: Het ingevoerde e-mailadres is al toegevoegd aan dit account
add_email_form.email_field_help: Voeg een alternatief e-mailadres toe dat u kunt gebruiken om toegang tot dit account te krijgen.
add_email_form.email_in_use_error: The entered email is already in use
add_email_form.password_confirmation: Confirm your account password to add this email address

no_active_sessions.default: You are not signed in to any web browsers.
no_active_sessions.inactive_90_days: All your sessions have been active in the last 90 days.

email_in_use.heading: The email address {{email}} is already in use.

end_session_button.confirmation_modal_title: Weet u zeker dat u deze sessie wilt beëindigen?

error.subtitle: Er is een onverwachte fout opgetreden. Probeer het opnieuw.
error.title: Er is iets misgegaan

errors.rate_limit_exceeded: You've made too many requests in a short period. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

description.account_locked: Your account is locked and can not be recovered at this time. If this is not expected, please contact your server administrator.
description.expired_recovery_ticket: The recovery link has expired. Please start the account recovery process again from the start.
description.invalid_new_password: The new password you chose is invalid; it may not meet the configured security policy.
description.no_current_password: You don't have a current password.
description.no_such_recovery_ticket: The recovery link is invalid. If you copied the link from the recovery e-mail, please check the full link was copied.
description.recovery_ticket_already_used: The recovery link has already been used. It cannot be used again.
description.unspecified: This might be a temporary problem, so please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact your server administrator.
description.wrong_password: The password you supplied as your current password is incorrect. Please try again.

password_change.subtitle: Choose a new password for your account.

success.description: Your password has been updated successfully.
success.title: Password updated

password_change.title: Change your password

consumed.subtitle: To create a new password, start over and select ”Forgot password“.
consumed.title: The link to reset your password has already been used

expired.subtitle: Request a new email that will be sent to: {{email}}
expired.title: The link to reset your password has expired

password_reset.subtitle: Choose a new password for your account.
password_reset.title: Reset your password

suggestion.all_uppercase: Capitalise some, but not all letters.
suggestion.another_word: Add more words that are less common.
suggestion.associated_years: Avoid years that are associated with you.
suggestion.capitalization: Capitalise more than the first letter.
suggestion.dates: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you.
suggestion.l33t: Avoid predictable letter substitutions like '@' for 'a'.
suggestion.longer_keyboard_pattern: Use longer keyboard patterns and change typing direction multiple times.
suggestion.no_need: You can create strong passwords without using symbols, numbers, or uppercase letters.
suggestion.pwned: If you use this password elsewhere, you should change it.
suggestion.reverse_words: Avoid reversed spellings of common words.
suggestion.use_words: Use multiple words, but avoid common phrases.

warning.common: This is a commonly used password.
warning.common_names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
warning.extended_repeat: Repeated character patterns like "abcabcabc" are easy to guess.
warning.key_pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
warning.names_by_themselves: Single names or surnames are easy to guess.
warning.pwned: Your password was exposed by a data breach on the Internet.
warning.recent_years: Recent years are easy to guess.
warning.sequences: Common character sequences like "abc" are easy to guess.
warning.similar_to_common: This is similar to a commonly used password.
warning.simple_repeat: Repeated characters like "aaa" are easy to guess.
warning.straight_row: Straight rows of keys on your keyboard are easy to guess.
warning.top_hundred: This is a frequently used password.
warning.top_ten: This is a heavily used password.
warning.user_inputs: There should not be any personal or page related data.
warning.word_by_itself: Single words are easy to guess.

cancelled.description_1: You can close this window and go back to the app to continue.
cancelled.description_2: If you're signed out everywhere and don't remember your recovery code, you'll still need to reset your identity.
cancelled.heading: Identity reset cancelled.

reset_cross_signing.description: Als u niet bent aangemeld bij andere apparaten en u bent uw herstelsleutel kwijt, moet u uw identiteit opnieuw instellen om de app te kunnen blijven gebruiken.

effect_list.negative_1: You will lose your existing message history
effect_list.negative_2: You will need to verify all your existing devices and contacts again
effect_list.neutral_1: You will lose any message history that's stored only on the server
effect_list.neutral_2: You will need to verify all your existing devices and contacts again
effect_list.positive_1: Your account details, contacts, preferences, and chat list will be kept

failure.description: This might be a temporary problem, so please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact your server administrator.
failure.heading: Failed to allow crypto identity reset
failure.title: Kan crypto identiteit niet toestaan

reset_cross_signing.heading: Stel uw identiteit opnieuw in als u op een andere manier niet kunt bevestigen

success.description: De identiteits reset is goedgekeurd voor de volgende {{minutes}} minuten. U kunt dit venster sluiten en teruggaan naar de app om door te gaan.
success.heading: Identity reset successfully. Go back to the app to finish the process.
success.title: Het opnieuw instellen van de crypto identiteit is tijdelijk toegestaan

reset_cross_signing.warning: Only reset your identity if you don't have access to another signed-in device and you've lost your recovery key.

set_device_name.help: Set a name that will help you identify this device.
set_device_name.label: Device name
set_device_name.title: Edit device name

alert.text: Deze sessie bestaat niet of is niet langer actief.
alert.title: Kan sessie niet vinden: {{deviceId}}
